EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS 13 OCT UNTIL
   FURTHER NOTICE BY M/V LAYLA IN AREA BOUND BY
   32-40N 011-15W, 32-38N 011-13W,
   32-20N 011-29W, 31-44N 012-10W,
   31-46N 012-14W, 32-26N 011-37W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3168/18.
